actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution extending sympathy and condolences to the families of the Canadian Soldiers who were killed and the Canadian soldiers who were wounded on April 18, 2002, in Afghanistan, and to all of the Canadian people.

summary.text: Expresses sorrow for the loss of life and wounding of Canadian servicemen in Afghanistan on April 18, 2002.Offers sympathy and condolences to their families and to all of the Canadian people.Affirms that the centuries-old bond between the Canadian and American peoples and their armed forces remains solid.Praises the Canadian servicemen's performance in Afghanistan for their heroism and professionalism.

titles.title: A resolution extending sympathy and condolences to the families of the Canadian Soldiers who were killed and the Canadian soldiers who were wounded on April 18, 2002, in Afghanistan, and to all of the Canadian people.
